page.title: 18PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: There are 9 people on the Parish Council. Three people are voted for each year and each member serves three or four years. They have Â£1500 a year which is given to them from the general rates.This is spent on things that are needed in the village.They look after things like the playing field and they inspect the plans for new houses.This year they are going to provide rubbish bins and seats on the village green,a hard standing outside the school and help with tree planting.They give donations to cubs and brownies and other associations. They have renewed the memorial outside the church. The Parish Council can only suggest things to people and advise them on local matters.
